channel.title: data factory on Pedro Junqueira
channel.description: Recent content in data factory on Pedro Junqueira

item.title: Do not use pandas use with pyodbc
item.description: Yesterday I published a post on and shared on LinkedIn and had a quite big reaction as an popular PBI influencer commented on my post. One of the comments by Jesus Jayaro called my attention saying that if pyodbc is used with execute many it is faster than data factory. So I did a quick research and in reality it is fast I am impressed. On my quick research I could put together a working script.

item.title: Do not use Pandas to load data use Data Factory
item.description: I recently wrote blog post about how to connect pandas to your SQL database and read file from SQL server. pandas is a fantastic tool to analyse and manipulate data. I use it all the time. It is very efficient if the “size” of the data is say up to 1 million records and can be done in your local machine or in a VM fairly quick calculations. No problems at all.
